name: Securities enabled
info: Firing system's securities are enabled, show is not able to start
description: Error thrown by the firing module when a security is still active while performing final module test

name: Command not understood
info: The command received is not valid
description: This errors occurs when a receiver receives a command that is unknown by the receiver or satelite
fix: Check command syntax, or check message decoding and finaly versions might be incompatible
